content.rendered:
Bet365 and Other UK Betting Sites from Kenya.

International betting sites offer pro-betting features that are grossly absent in many local bet sites. BET 365 is a descent example of a betting site that offers such features. Joining such a betting site is not as hard as you might think. All you need is a good internet connection and a bank account. In this post you will learn how to deposit money onto these international betting sites with ease.

.The guide given below will teach you how to deposit money into your account on bet 365. The same procedure is also applicable to other international betting sites out there. Kindly check out our list of international Betting Sites that you can join from Kenya and their respective bonuses.

How to Sign up to Bet365.

You can visit the Bet365 website by clicking this link.

Click on the sports section shown below

Click on (sports) so that you can be taken to the sports betting section.

Click on ‘Join Now’

Here, you will be required to fill in your personal details with utmost accuracy, especially given that there are strict rules and regulations in these international betting sites. The scrutiny at this level is so high that you may be additionally asked to provide a scanned copy of your national ID.

Upon completion of your registration, you will be asked to select a payment option by a pop-up window that will appear on your screen. From here, you can proceed to the next part of this exercise. 

How to Deposit and Withdraw from Bet365

Here, there are several methods of depositing money. The fact that all deposit options are international means that you cannot use Mpesa or airtel money. For someone who does not know how to use these international means of depositing, getting stuck is easy.

Skrill and Neteller are the main deposit options for anyone to use. How they work is quite simple as well.

How to Use Skrill to Deposit to Bet365.

Skrill is one of the few international money transfer options. It is almost identical to PayPal and supports direct withdrawals to your Mpesa account. Given that you cannot load money directly into this account, there are a number of options you can opt for. The first one is through your bank account. You can send money directly from your bank account and use Skrill to make a deposit into your bet 365 account. If you run into any problems, you can consult with your bank of choice to give you further assistance. Itechjungle is a preferred plan B if the first one fails. After ensuring your Skrill account is well loaded with cash, all you have to do now is go to the deposit section and make deposits at no extra costs.

How to Use Neteller to Deposit to Bet365.

Neteller is a preferred method of depositing money since it is widely acceptable by many betting sites. When signing up on Neteller, the procedure is quite straightforward. The only things you have to remember are that using dollars is more preferable since it will save you plenty of future conversations costs and that the minimum amount of money you can deposit using Neteller is $ 50. For Neteller, it is recommended that you use dollars while for Skrill, you ought to use Euros.

Depositing to Neteller (Step by Step)

Sign in to Neteller

Click on the Deposit Button

Select your Deposit Method

Here you are supposed to select any local deposit option eg ATM card payment. After depositing, you now have to log into your bet 365 account and link it to your Neteller account.

Learn about premierBet Kenya

Withdrawing from Neteller.

You first have to enter into your Neteller Account then withdraw any amount you choose. It is important that you have a Neteller prepaid Master card which you can apply for and get within two weeks. Upon receiving and activating this card, you are free to make as many transactions as you choose.

Advantages of Betting on International Betting Sites

Higher odds, matched betting and superior features.
